Col. Lyons to Surveyor Cotton
Louisville June 25/61
C. B. Cotton Esq
Collector
Dr. Sir

I am instructed by General Buckner to send to Columbus, Ky, for the use of the Ky State Guard, thirty tents and cooking utensils for One hundred and fifty men. Will you be kind enough to give me a permit to send them by water or rail.

Respy
(Signed) Henry J. Lyons
Asst. Quarter Master Genl.

(seal)
Chas. B. Cotton
Att'y at Law
Notary Public Surveyor of Customs
Louisville, Ky
